skills.name: Chaos Engineering
skills.pattern: Controlled experiments, discover weaknesses, improve resilience

skills.name: Chaos Principles
skills.pattern: Steady state, hypothesis, real-world events, minimize blast radius

skills.name: Chaos vs Testing
skills.pattern: Testing: known bugs, Chaos: unknown unknowns

skills.name: Experiment Design
skills.pattern: Hypothesis, steady state, variables, rollback plan

skills.name: Blast Radius
skills.pattern: Start small, percentage of traffic, quick abort

skills.name: Steady State
skills.pattern: Define metrics baseline, latency, error rate, throughput

skills.name: Network Failures
skills.pattern: Latency, packet loss, partition, DNS failures

skills.name: Server Failures
skills.pattern: Kill processes, restart servers, CPU/memory stress

skills.name: Dependency Failures
skills.pattern: Database down, API timeout, cache failure

skills.name: Resource Exhaustion
skills.pattern: Memory leak, disk full, file descriptor exhaustion

skills.name: Chaos Monkey
skills.pattern: Random instance termination, Simian Army

skills.name: Gremlin
skills.pattern: SaaS chaos, attack library, safety controls

skills.name: Litmus
skills.pattern: Cloud-native, ChaosHub, Kubernetes native

skills.name: Chaos Mesh
skills.pattern: Pod kill, network chaos, time chaos, IO chaos

skills.name: Toxiproxy
skills.pattern: Proxy that injects latency, timeouts, bandwidth limits

skills.name: Pod Chaos
skills.pattern: Random pod deletion, test self-healing

skills.name: Node Chaos
skills.pattern: Drain node, cordon, test pod rescheduling

skills.name: Network Policies
skills.pattern: Block traffic between services, test isolation

skills.name: Circuit Breaker Test
skills.pattern: Verify circuit opens, fallback works, recovery

skills.name: Retry Test
skills.pattern: Inject failures, verify retry logic, backoff

skills.name: Timeout Test
skills.pattern: Add latency, verify timeout fires, no hangs

skills.name: Game Days
skills.pattern: Scheduled chaos, team response, learning

skills.name: Runbook Validation
skills.pattern: Verify runbooks work, update as needed

skills.name: Incident Simulation
skills.pattern: Simulate incidents, practice escalation, comms

skills.name: Chaos Observability
skills.pattern: Metrics during chaos, trace failures, dashboards

skills.name: Experiment Results
skills.pattern: Record outcomes, action items, improvements

skills.name: Safety Controls
skills.pattern: Kill switch, automatic rollback, time limits

skills.name: Production Readiness
skills.pattern: Start in staging, prove value, gradual rollout

skills.name: Chaos Culture
skills.pattern: Blameless, learning focus, regular practice

skills.name: SRE Integration
skills.pattern: Error budgets, SLO validation, reliability testing
